item.title: 🧑‍💼 About
item.description:
📝 Intro

My journey involves finishing a masters degree in Electrical Engineering at USC to working as a Sr. Software Engineer in the Observability space at a Fintech company in the Bay Area of California.

🚀 Skills & Expertise

🌐 Cloud Infrastructure

  • EKS on AWS: Hands-on experience with deploying, scaling, and maintaining Kubernetes on AWS.
  • Optimizing Observability Platforms: Expertise in scaling observability systems to accommodate company growth while maintaining budget efficiency.

📊 Observability Stack

  • Logging: ElasticSearch for scalable log aggregation and analysis.
  • Metrics: Prometheus for monitoring and alerting with custom integrations.
  • Tracing: Deep integration with OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing.

⚙️ Data Pipelines & Streaming

  • ETL Pipelines: Architecting ETL processes to transform raw logs into actionable analytics.
  • Flink Streaming: Building real-time SLO systems using Apache Flink to process telemetry data efficiently.
